shows.title: Mitchell
shows.overview: A tough, slobby, honest cop risks his life trying to simultaneously take down drug dealers and a corrupt businessman who murdered a burgurlar.

shows.title: #Horror
shows.overview: Based on a horrifying true story, a group of prep-school girls experience a deadly night of terror when a vicious online game turns bloody. Chloë Sevigny & Timothy Hutton star.
Joe enlists the help of a friendly woman as he sets out to fleece the criminally over-privileged of one-million dollars from a safe-deposit vault.
A young British soldier is accidentally abandoned by his unit following a riot on the streets of Belfast in 1971, and must survive against the odds.

shows.title: 'G' Men
shows.overview: James Cagney helped jump-start the gangster genre as The Public Enemy.Outcries against movies that glorified underworld criminals put Cagneyon the side of the law in "G" Men.

shows.title: ...And Justice for All
shows.overview: Al Pacino, an idealistic lawyer trapped in a hypocritical and corrupt legal system, finds himself defending a self-righteous judge. Satirical drama. (1979)(119 mins)
Milla Jovovich is Kat, a criminal who works with her drug-dealing boyfriend, until he attacks her. Now, she’s out to seek revenge against him.

shows.title: 009-1: The End of the Beginning
shows.overview: An adaptation of Shotaro Ishinomori's manga about a cyborg spy with a heart of pure steel, Mylene, who’s designed to be the perfect killing machine.
shows.originalTitle: 009ノ1（ゼロゼロクノイチ） THE END OF THE BEGINNING

shows.title: 1 Interrogation
shows.overview: A career detective in a high-stakes criminal interrogation unit has learned over 40 years that while some are criminals, some are victims too.

shows.title: 10 Grams
shows.overview: Charles, a defence lawyer, hides his role in a European drug ring. When one of his new couriers refuses to follow his rules, he realises he is a small cog in the huge wheel of organised crime.

shows.title: 10 Kilos in the Trunk
shows.overview: When her friend gets locked up, Monica agrees to deliver a very important package in the trunk of her car, but a series of obstacles gets in the way.

shows.title: 10 Minutes Gone
shows.overview: Action legends Bruce Willis (Die Hard) and Michael Chiklis ("The Shield") light up this edge-of-your seat thriller. Crime boss Rex hires Frank to steal a priceless jewel stash-but the job goes wrong when someone tips off the cops. After suffering a blow to the head, Frank wakes up to find the jewels gone and no memory of his attacker. Now he must find the traitor within his team.

shows.title: 10 Rillington Place
shows.overview: The horrifying true account of John Reginald Christie, whose savage murder of a woman and her newborn summarily ended capital punishment in Britain.

shows.title: 10 to Midnight
shows.overview: When the legal system sets a homicidal maniac free, a cynical cop is left with only one option: to hunt him down on his own before he strikes again.

shows.title: 100 Bullets
shows.overview: Years after a robber is betrayed by one of his partners in crime and murdered and a stolen fortune is lost, a secret revenge plot begins to unfold.

shows.title: 100 Days to Live
shows.overview: When a serial killer abducts a young woman's fiancé, she must race against the clock to discover the identity of the killer and, more importantly, his motive.

shows.title: 100 Kilos
shows.overview: Tale of the Freeway Boyz, young men who sold millions of dollars’ worth of street drugs in South Central L.A. that funded a CIA drug war in Nicaragua.

shows.title: 100 Streets
shows.overview: The interconnecting stories of three people: a wife and mother, a small-time drug dealer, and a cab driver – all within a hundred contemporary London streets.

shows.title: 101 Dalmatians
shows.overview: Dalmatians Pongo and Perdita are overjoyed by the arrival of 15 puppies. But when the spotted-fur-loving Ms. De Vil dognaps the litter---along with every other Dalmatian pup in London---Pongo and Perdy must rally the town's animals to their rescue.
